title: Founders Team Analyst (0-1 yrs only)
description:
Company Overview:




ITILITE is a leading global brand in the Business Travel, Expense & Cards Management space.

Our mission is to help companies simplify their travel and expense processes, making it an enjoyable experience for employees. We operate on a B2B SaaS model, with a strong presence in India and the USA, serving over 500 customers.

We are a Series C funded company, having raised over $45 million from Global Tier 1 VCs like Tiger Global, VY Capital, Greenoaks, and Z47 (Matrix Partners).




Founder Profiles:

Mayank Kukreja (CEO) → Alumnus of IIT and IIM, with professional experience at McKinsey and Myntra.
Anish Khadiya (CBO) → Alumnus of IIT and IIM, with a background in ITC, McKinsey, and Myntra.




Role Overview:




As a Founders' team analyst, you will help the company leadership solve high-impact challenges, that drive the company forward. From the outset, you will get the opportunity to work across various functions, including Sales, Customer Success, Finance, Supply, and Product amongst others.




We empower you to pick up areas that require first-principles thinking and challenge the status quo, including what the leadership/founders may have built.




Within your first 6 months, you can expect to own problem statements like “How do we double our Ad CTRs?” where you take full ownership of efforts & outcomes.

Within 2 years, you will lead multiple cross-functional projects, ranging from new lead gen channels to new supplier evaluation.




Along the way, you will work directly with the founders and leadership team helping them prioritize areas that move the company forward.




Career Trajectory & Scope:




This role is highly cross-functional and you will get to contribute to every high-priority area in the company. Here’s what our current founders' team is working on:




Hitesh Awtaney (ex-Founder) → Associate to Director (4 yrs)

0-1 leading Supply, Business Finance // 30% uptick in revenue
10-100 in Customer Experience // Scaled operations to 4x in 5 months
10-100 in demand generation // 40% drop in Cost per opportunity
Currently leading P&L growth and profitability for a business unit

Mrinal Ganapathy (Manipal, ex-Cred) → Analyst to Senior Associate (2 yrs)

1-10 leading Customer experience & analytics // 15% uptick in revenue
0-1 leading Customer Success for a new geo // 10x revenue in a year
1-10 setting up Intent as a channel for lead generation // 25% uptick in pipeline
Currently scaling partnerships as a growth channel for our global business




Ideal Candidate Profile:




0-1 years of full-time experience, engineering undergrads, interest in sales & marketing.




The following mindset will make you successful in the role:

Openness to question, try new things, and the willingness to hustle
Setting high-performance standards (and moving people to make it happen!)
Ability to adapt (and thrive) when faced with new challenges
Comfortable with experimentation, testing, and learning from failures




This isn’t a role for people who want to specialize.




If you feel you can achieve great results in any area you pick, this is the role for you.




If you are looking for a non-linear growth trajectory, this role is definitely for you.




Application Process: LinkedIn only. No DMs.
